title: Experimental design
creator_credit: Open University, BBC-TV and Victor Lockwood
brief_description: Rhys L.L. Davies demonstrates his innovative method of teaching fractions to primary school children. He discusses the methodology he used to test his method against traditional text books and Quizinnaire. Shows Rhys using the three methods with his students in class.
